title: Amazon cuts NVIDIA orders in anticipation of latest chip
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) has hit the brakes on orders from NVIDIA Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA, ETR:NVD)'s in anticipation of the AI chipmaker's next release later this year. Amazon Web Services' previous orders for NVIDIA's Grace Hopper superchip have been “fully transitioned” to contracts for successor Blackwell, the company told the Financial Times.

title: 3 Reasons I Bought Nvidia Before Earnings
text: Nvidia's earnings report is expected to beat expectations, and the company is expected to raise guidance, potentially leading to a big rise in stock price. The demand for Nvidia's chips is insatiable, with the company expected to consume half of TSMC's advanced chip packaging capacity. TSMC is increasing capacity 5X between 2023 and 2025, potentially allowing NVDA to deliver 80% higher sales in 2025 than currently expected.
